00076 static const unsigned short RoadTable[16] = {
00077     ROADS, ROADS2, ROADS, ROADS3,
00078     ROADS2, ROADS2, ROADS4, ROADS8,
00079     ROADS, ROADS6, ROADS, ROADS7,
00080     ROADS5, ROADS10, ROADS9, INTERSECTION
00081 };
00082 
00083 static const unsigned short RailTable[16] = {
00084     LHRAIL, LVRAIL, LHRAIL, LVRAIL2,
00085     LVRAIL, LVRAIL, LVRAIL3, LVRAIL7,
00086     LHRAIL, LVRAIL5, LHRAIL, LVRAIL6,
00087     LVRAIL4, LVRAIL9, LVRAIL8, LVRAIL10
00088 };
00089 
00090 static const unsigned short WireTable[16] = {
00091     LHPOWER, LVPOWER, LHPOWER, LVPOWER2,
00092     LVPOWER, LVPOWER, LVPOWER3, LVPOWER7,
00093     LHPOWER, LVPOWER5, LHPOWER, LVPOWER6,
00094     LVPOWER4, LVPOWER9, LVPOWER8, LVPOWER10
00095 };

00105 static inline MapTile neutralizeRoad(MapTile tile)
00106 {
00107     if (tile >= 64 && tile <= 207) {
00108         tile = (tile & 0x000F) + 64;
00109     }
00110     return tile;
00111 };
00112 
00122 ToolResult Micropolis::connectTile(short x, short y,
00123                                    ConnectTileCommand cmd, ToolEffects *effects)
00124 {
00125     ToolResult result = TOOLRESULT_OK;
00126 
00127     // Make sure the array subscripts are in bounds.
00128     if (!testBounds(x, y)) {
00129         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00130     }
00131 
00132     // Perform auto-doze if appropriate.
00133     switch (cmd) {
00134 
00135         case CONNECT_TILE_ROAD:
00136         case CONNECT_TILE_RAILROAD:
00137         case CONNECT_TILE_WIRE:
00138 
00139             // Silently skip auto-bulldoze if no money.
00140             if (autoBulldoze) {
00141 
00142                 MapValue mapVal = effects->getMapValue(x, y);
00143 
00144                 if (mapVal & BULLBIT) {
00145                     mapVal &= LOMASK;
00146                     mapVal = neutralizeRoad(mapVal);
00147 
00148                     /* Maybe this should check BULLBIT instead of checking tile values? */
00149                     if ((mapVal >= TINYEXP && mapVal <= LASTTINYEXP) ||
00150                             (mapVal < HBRIDGE && mapVal != DIRT)) {
00151 
00152                         effects->addCost(1);
00153 
00154                         effects->setMapValue(x, y, DIRT);
00155 
00156                     }
00157                 }
00158             }
00159             break;
00160 
00161         default:
00162             // Do nothing.
00163             break;
00164 
00165     }
00166 
00167     // Perform the command.
00168     switch (cmd) {
00169 
00170     case CONNECT_TILE_FIX: // Fix zone.
00171         fixZone(x, y, effects);
00172         break;
00173 
00174     case CONNECT_TILE_BULLDOZE: // Bulldoze zone.
00175         result = layDoze(x, y, effects);
00176         fixZone(x, y, effects);
00177         break;
00178 
00179     case CONNECT_TILE_ROAD: // Lay road.
00180         result = layRoad(x, y, effects);
00181         fixZone(x, y, effects);
00182         break;
00183 
00184     case CONNECT_TILE_RAILROAD: // Lay railroad.
00185         result = layRail(x, y, effects);
00186         fixZone(x, y, effects);
00187         break;
00188 
00189     case CONNECT_TILE_WIRE: // Lay wire.
00190         result = layWire(x, y, effects);
00191         fixZone(x, y, effects);
00192         break;
00193 
00194     default:
00195         NOT_REACHED();
00196         break;
00197 
00198     }
00199 
00200     return result;
00201 }
00202 
00203 
00211 ToolResult Micropolis::layDoze(int x, int y, ToolEffects *effects)
00212 {
00213     MapValue tile = effects->getMapValue(x, y);
00214 
00215     if (!(tile & BULLBIT)) {
00216         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;         /* Check dozeable bit. */
00217     }
00218 
00219     tile &= LOMASK;
00220     tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00221 
00222     switch (tile) {
00223     case HBRIDGE:
00224     case VBRIDGE:
00225     case BRWV:
00226     case BRWH:
00227     case HBRDG0:
00228     case HBRDG1:
00229     case HBRDG2:
00230     case HBRDG3:
00231     case VBRDG0:
00232     case VBRDG1:
00233     case VBRDG2:
00234     case VBRDG3:
00235     case HPOWER:
00236     case VPOWER:
00237     case HRAIL:
00238     case VRAIL:           /* Dozing over water, replace with water. */
00239         effects->setMapValue(x, y, RIVER);
00240         break;
00241 
00242     default:              /* Dozing on land, replace with land.  Simple, eh? */
00243         effects->setMapValue(x, y, DIRT);
00244         break;
00245     }
00246 
00247     effects->addCost(1);                     /* Costs $1.00.... */
00248 
00249     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00250 }
00251 
00252 
00260 ToolResult Micropolis::layRoad(int x, int y, ToolEffects *effects)
00261 {
00262     int cost = 10;
00263 
00264     MapTile tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y);
00265 
00266     switch (tile) {
00267 
00268     case DIRT:
00269         effects->setMapValue(x, y, ROADS | BULLBIT | BURNBIT);
00270         break;
00271 
00272     case RIVER:                   /* Road on Water */
00273     case REDGE:
00274     case CHANNEL:                 /* Check how to build bridges, if possible. */
00275         cost = 50;
00276 
00277         if (x < WORLD_W - 1) {
00278             tile = effects->getMapTile(x + 1, y);
00279             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00280             if (tile == VRAILROAD || tile == HBRIDGE
00281                                 || (tile >= ROADS && tile <= HROADPOWER)) {
00282                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, HBRIDGE | BULLBIT);
00283                 break;
00284             }
00285         }
00286 
00287         if (x > 0) {
00288             tile = effects->getMapTile(x - 1, y);
00289             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00290             if (tile == VRAILROAD || tile == HBRIDGE
00291                                 || (tile >= ROADS && tile <= INTERSECTION)) {
00292                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, HBRIDGE | BULLBIT);
00293                 break;
00294             }
00295         }
00296 
00297         if (y < WORLD_H - 1) {
00298             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y + 1);
00299             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00300             if (tile == HRAILROAD || tile == VROADPOWER
00301                                 || (tile >= VBRIDGE && tile <= INTERSECTION)) {
00302                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, VBRIDGE | BULLBIT);
00303                 break;
00304             }
00305         }
00306 
00307         if (y > 0) {
00308             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y - 1);
00309             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00310             if (tile == HRAILROAD || tile == VROADPOWER
00311                                 || (tile >= VBRIDGE && tile <= INTERSECTION)) {
00312                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, VBRIDGE | BULLBIT);
00313                 break;
00314             }
00315         }
00316 
00317         /* Can't do road... */
00318         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00319 
00320     case LHPOWER:         /* Road on power */
00321         effects->setMapValue(x, y, VROADPOWER | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00322         break;
00323 
00324     case LVPOWER:         /* Road on power #2 */
00325         effects->setMapValue(x, y, HROADPOWER | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00326         break;
00327 
00328     case LHRAIL:          /* Road on rail */
00329         effects->setMapValue(x, y, HRAILROAD | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00330         break;
00331 
00332     case LVRAIL:          /* Road on rail #2 */
00333         effects->setMapValue(x, y, VRAILROAD | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00334         break;
00335 
00336     default:              /* Can't do road */
00337         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00338 
00339     }
00340 
00341     effects->addCost(cost);
00342     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00343 }

00345 
00353 ToolResult Micropolis::layRail(int x, int y, ToolEffects *effects)
00354 {
00355     int cost = 20;
00356 
00357     MapTile tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y);
00358 
00359     tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00360 
00361     switch (tile) {
00362     case DIRT:                   /* Rail on Dirt */
00363 
00364         effects->setMapValue(x, y, LHRAIL | BULLBIT | BURNBIT);
00365 
00366         break;
00367 
00368     case RIVER:      /* Rail on Water */
00369     case REDGE:
00370     case CHANNEL:    /* Check how to build underwater tunnel, if possible. */
00371 
00372         cost = 100;
00373 
00374         if (x < WORLD_W - 1) {
00375             tile = effects->getMapTile(x + 1, y);
00376             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00377             if (tile == RAILHPOWERV || tile == HRAIL
00378                                     || (tile >= LHRAIL && tile <= HRAILROAD)) {
00379                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, HRAIL | BULLBIT);
00380                 break;
00381             }
00382         }
00383 
00384         if (x > 0) {
00385             tile = effects->getMapTile(x - 1, y);
00386             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00387             if (tile == RAILHPOWERV || tile == HRAIL
00388                                     || (tile > VRAIL && tile < VRAILROAD)) {
00389                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, HRAIL | BULLBIT);
00390                 break;
00391             }
00392         }
00393 
00394         if (y < WORLD_H - 1) {
00395             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y + 1);
00396             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00397             if (tile == RAILVPOWERH || tile == VRAILROAD
00398                                     || (tile > HRAIL && tile < HRAILROAD)) {
00399                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, VRAIL | BULLBIT);
00400                 break;
00401             }
00402         }
00403 
00404         if (y > 0) {
00405             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y - 1);
00406             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00407             if (tile == RAILVPOWERH || tile == VRAILROAD
00408                                     || (tile > HRAIL && tile < HRAILROAD)) {
00409                 effects->setMapValue(x, y, VRAIL | BULLBIT);
00410                 break;
00411             }
00412         }
00413 
00414         /* Can't do rail... */
00415         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00416 
00417     case LHPOWER:             /* Rail on power */
00418         effects->setMapValue(x, y, RAILVPOWERH | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00419         break;
00420 
00421     case LVPOWER:             /* Rail on power #2 */
00422         effects->setMapValue(x, y, RAILHPOWERV | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00423         break;
00424 
00425     case ROADS:              /* Rail on road */
00426         effects->setMapValue(x, y, VRAILROAD | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00427         break;
00428 
00429     case ROADS2:              /* Rail on road #2 */
00430         effects->setMapValue(x, y, HRAILROAD | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00431         break;
00432 
00433     default:              /* Can't do rail */
00434         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00435     }
00436 
00437     effects->addCost(cost);
00438     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00439 }

00441 
00449 ToolResult Micropolis::layWire(int x, int y, ToolEffects *effects)
00450 {
00451     int cost = 5;
00452 
00453     MapTile tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y);
00454 
00455     tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00456 
00457     switch (tile) {
00458 
00459     case DIRT:            /* Wire on Dirt */
00460 
00461         effects->setMapValue(x, y, LHPOWER | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00462 
00463         break;
00464 
00465     case RIVER:           /* Wire on Water */
00466     case REDGE:
00467     case CHANNEL:         /* Check how to lay underwater wire, if possible. */
00468 
00469         cost = 25;
00470 
00471         if (x < WORLD_W - 1) {
00472             tile = effects->getMapValue(x + 1, y);
00473             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00474                 tile &= LOMASK;
00475                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00476                 if (tile != HROADPOWER && tile != RAILHPOWERV && tile != HPOWER) {
00477                     effects->setMapValue(x, y, VPOWER | CONDBIT | BULLBIT);
00478                     break;
00479                 }
00480             }
00481         }
00482 
00483         if (x > 0) {
00484             tile = effects->getMapValue(x - 1, y);
00485             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00486                 tile &= LOMASK;
00487                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00488                 if (tile != HROADPOWER && tile != RAILHPOWERV && tile != HPOWER) {
00489                     effects->setMapValue(x, y, VPOWER | CONDBIT | BULLBIT);
00490                     break;
00491                 }
00492             }
00493         }
00494 
00495         if (y < WORLD_H - 1) {
00496             tile = effects->getMapValue(x, y + 1);
00497             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00498                 tile &= LOMASK;
00499                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00500                 if (tile != VROADPOWER && tile != RAILVPOWERH && tile != VPOWER) {
00501                     effects->setMapValue(x, y, HPOWER | CONDBIT | BULLBIT);
00502                     break;
00503                 }
00504             }
00505         }
00506 
00507         if (y > 0) {
00508             tile = effects->getMapValue(x, y - 1);
00509             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00510                 tile &= LOMASK;
00511                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00512                 if (tile != VROADPOWER && tile != RAILVPOWERH && tile != VPOWER) {
00513                     effects->setMapValue(x, y, HPOWER | CONDBIT | BULLBIT);
00514                     break;
00515                 }
00516             }
00517         }
00518 
00519         /* Can't do wire... */
00520         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00521 
00522     case ROADS:              /* Wire on Road */
00523         effects->setMapValue(x, y, HROADPOWER | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00524         break;
00525 
00526     case ROADS2:              /* Wire on Road #2 */
00527         effects->setMapValue(x, y, VROADPOWER | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00528         break;
00529 
00530     case LHRAIL:             /* Wire on rail */
00531         effects->setMapValue(x, y, RAILHPOWERV | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00532         break;
00533 
00534     case LVRAIL:             /* Wire on rail #2 */
00535         effects->setMapValue(x, y, RAILVPOWERH | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT);
00536         break;
00537 
00538     default:              /* Can't do wire */
00539         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00540 
00541     }
00542 
00543     effects->addCost(cost);
00544     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00545 }
00546 
00547 
00554 void Micropolis::fixZone(int x, int y, ToolEffects *effects)
00555 {
00556     fixSingle(x, y, effects);
00557 
00558     if (y > 0) {
00559         fixSingle(x, y - 1, effects);
00560     }
00561 
00562     if (x < WORLD_W - 1) {
00563         fixSingle(x + 1, y, effects);
00564     }
00565 
00566     if (y < WORLD_H - 1) {
00567         fixSingle(x, y + 1, effects);
00568     }
00569 
00570     if (x > 0) {
00571         fixSingle(x - 1, y, effects);
00572     }
00573 }
00574 
00575 
00582 void Micropolis::fixSingle(int x, int y, ToolEffects *effects)
00583 {
00584     unsigned short adjTile = 0;
00585 
00586     MapTile tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y);
00587 
00588     tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00589 
00590     if (tile >= ROADS && tile <= INTERSECTION) {           /* Cleanup Road */
00591 
00592         if (y > 0) {
00593             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y - 1);
00594             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00595             if ((tile == HRAILROAD || (tile >= ROADBASE && tile <= VROADPOWER))
00596                                 && tile != HROADPOWER && tile != VRAILROAD
00597                                 && tile != ROADBASE) {
00598                 adjTile |= 0x0001;
00599             }
00600         }
00601 
00602         if (x < WORLD_W - 1) {
00603             tile = effects->getMapTile(x + 1, y);
00604             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00605             if ((tile == VRAILROAD || (tile >= ROADBASE && tile <= VROADPOWER))
00606                                 && tile != VROADPOWER && tile != HRAILROAD
00607                                 && tile != VBRIDGE) {
00608                 adjTile |= 0x0002;
00609             }
00610         }
00611 
00612         if (y < WORLD_H - 1) {
00613             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y + 1);
00614             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00615             if ((tile == HRAILROAD || (tile >= ROADBASE && tile <= VROADPOWER))
00616                                 && tile != HROADPOWER && tile != VRAILROAD
00617                                 && tile != ROADBASE) {
00618                 adjTile |= 0x0004;
00619             }
00620         }
00621 
00622         if (x > 0) {
00623             tile = effects->getMapTile(x - 1, y);
00624             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00625             if ((tile == VRAILROAD || (tile >= ROADBASE && tile <= VROADPOWER))
00626                                 && tile != VROADPOWER && tile != HRAILROAD
00627                                 && tile != VBRIDGE) {
00628                 adjTile |= 0x0008;
00629             }
00630         }
00631 
00632         effects->setMapValue(x, y, RoadTable[adjTile] | BULLBIT | BURNBIT);
00633         return;
00634     }
00635 
00636     if (tile >= LHRAIL && tile <= LVRAIL10) {         /* Cleanup Rail */
00637 
00638         if (y > 0) {
00639             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y - 1);
00640             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00641             if (tile >= RAILHPOWERV && tile <= VRAILROAD
00642                                 && tile != RAILHPOWERV && tile != HRAILROAD
00643                                 && tile != HRAIL) {
00644                 adjTile |= 0x0001;
00645             }
00646         }
00647 
00648         if (x < WORLD_W - 1) {
00649             tile = effects->getMapTile(x + 1, y);
00650             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00651             if (tile >= RAILHPOWERV && tile <= VRAILROAD
00652                                 && tile != RAILVPOWERH && tile != VRAILROAD
00653                                 && tile != VRAIL) {
00654                 adjTile |= 0x0002;
00655             }
00656         }
00657 
00658         if (y < WORLD_H - 1) {
00659             tile = effects->getMapTile(x, y + 1);
00660             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00661             if (tile >= RAILHPOWERV && tile <= VRAILROAD
00662                                 && tile != RAILHPOWERV && tile != HRAILROAD
00663                                 && tile != HRAIL) {
00664                 adjTile |= 0x0004;
00665             }
00666         }
00667 
00668         if (x > 0) {
00669             tile = effects->getMapTile(x - 1, y);
00670             tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00671             if (tile >= RAILHPOWERV && tile <= VRAILROAD
00672                                 && tile != RAILVPOWERH && tile != VRAILROAD
00673                                 && tile != VRAIL) {
00674                 adjTile |= 0x0008;
00675             }
00676         }
00677 
00678         effects->setMapValue(x, y, RailTable[adjTile] | BULLBIT | BURNBIT);
00679         return;
00680     }
00681 
00682     if (tile >= LHPOWER && tile <= LVPOWER10) {         /* Cleanup Wire */
00683 
00684         if (y > 0) {
00685             tile = effects->getMapValue(x, y - 1);
00686             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00687                 tile &= LOMASK;
00688                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00689                 if (tile != VPOWER && tile != VROADPOWER && tile != RAILVPOWERH) {
00690                     adjTile |= 0x0001;
00691                 }
00692             }
00693         }
00694 
00695         if (x < WORLD_W - 1) {
00696             tile = effects->getMapValue(x + 1, y);
00697             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00698                 tile &= LOMASK;
00699                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00700                 if (tile != HPOWER && tile != HROADPOWER && tile != RAILHPOWERV) {
00701                     adjTile |= 0x0002;
00702                 }
00703             }
00704         }
00705 
00706         if (y < WORLD_H - 1) {
00707             tile = effects->getMapValue(x, y + 1);
00708             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00709                 tile &= LOMASK;
00710                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00711                 if (tile != VPOWER && tile != VROADPOWER && tile != RAILVPOWERH) {
00712                     adjTile |= 0x0004;
00713                 }
00714             }
00715         }
00716 
00717         if (x > 0) {
00718             tile = effects->getMapValue(x - 1, y);
00719             if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00720                 tile &= LOMASK;
00721                 tile = neutralizeRoad(tile);
00722                 if (tile != HPOWER && tile != HROADPOWER && tile != RAILHPOWERV) {
00723                     adjTile |= 0x0008;
00724                 }
00725             }
00726         }
00727 
00728         effects->setMapValue(x, y, WireTable[adjTile] | BLBNCNBIT);
00729         return;
00730     }
00731 }
00732
